PLZ, NO more ooC's by themselves and NO one line posts so you can 
make an ooC. That's for private email. If you feel inlcined to 
making an ooC, ensure that it is relavant to the rpg, and that it 
contains all of your current thoughts on the subject. Don't post one 
message then add onto it with a little more for several consecutive 
emails...
